member.name: T:BallisticSolutions.Bsc
member.summary: Bsc - Ballistic Solutions Calculator. Provides methods for calculating projectile interception with moving targets. It computes interception times, impact positions, and required firing velocities while accounting for both projectile and target velocities and accelerations.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.Bsc.Position``1(``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: Elapsed time.
Initial velocity vector.
Constant acceleration vector.
member.returns: The displacement vector after has elapsed.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.Bsc.BestImpactPosition``1(``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.summary: Computes the impact position of the earliest valid interception.
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: The speed of the projectile.
The vector from the shooter to the target.
The velocity vector of the target.
The acceleration vector of the projectile.
The acceleration vector of the target.
member.returns: The impact position vector. Returns Vector.NaN if interception is impossible.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.Bsc.ImpactPositions``1(``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.summary: Computes all possible impact positions corresponding to valid interception times.
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: The speed of the projectile.
The vector from the shooter to the target.
The velocity vector of the target.
The acceleration vector of the projectile.
The acceleration vector of the target.
member.returns: An array of vectors representing all valid impact positions.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.Bsc.BestImpactTime``1(``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.summary: Computes the earliest positive interception time between a projectile and a moving target.
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: The speed of the projectile.
The vector from the shooter to the target.
The velocity vector of the target.
The acceleration vector of the projectile.
The acceleration vector of the target.
member.returns: The earliest interception time (t > 0). Returns if no interception is possible.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.Bsc.ImpactTimes``1(``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.summary: Computes all possible interception times between a projectile and a moving target.
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: The speed of the projectile.
The vector from the shooter to the target.
The velocity vector of the target.
The acceleration vector of the projectile.
The acceleration vector of the target.
member.returns: A sorted array of all valid interception times (t > 0). Empty if interception is impossible.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.Bsc.FiringVelocity``1(``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.summary: Computes the firing velocity required to hit the target at a given interception time.
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: The time until interception (must be positive).
The vector from the shooter to the target.
The velocity vector of the target.
The acceleration vector of the projectile.
The acceleration vector of the target.
member.returns: The required firing velocity vector. Returns Vector.NaN if â‰¤ 0.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.Bsc.BestFiringVelocity``1(``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.summary: Computes the firing velocity required for the earliest valid interception.
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: The speed of the projectile.
The vector from the shooter to the target.
The velocity vector of the target.
The acceleration vector of the projectile.
The acceleration vector of the target.
member.returns: The required firing velocity vector. Returns Vector.NaN if interception is impossible.

member.name: M:BallisticSolutions.Bsc.FiringVelocities``1(``0,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4,Godot.Vector4)
member.summary: Computes firing velocities for all valid interception times.
member.typeparam: A floating-point numeric type (e.g., float, double) implementing .
member.param: The speed of the projectile.
The vector from the shooter to the target.
The velocity vector of the target.
The acceleration vector of the projectile.
The acceleration vector of the target.
member.returns: An array of firing velocity vectors, one for each valid interception time.
